categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Johnny Yong Bosch (born January 6, 1976) is an American actor most known for his work as Adam Park in the Power Rangers franchise and for his voice-over work in anime films and series such as Bleach and Trigun as well as in video games such as Dissidia: Final Fantasy, Devil May Cry 4, and Transformers: War for Cybertron. He is currently voicing Nate Adams the main character on Yo-kai Watch.
